entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Collins Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:17 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collins Bay 09:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023
Temperature: -17.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -19.1°C
Wind: NNE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow this morning and ending near noon then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 31 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023
